channel.title: Where do u put the npc talk thing like where at in npchandler?
channel.description: ok i go into npc handler (btw im useing testscape) and how do i spawn stuff in autospawn because when i put it in there it doesnt put it in the server!?!?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 06:13:51 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Where do u put the npc talk thing like where at in npchandler?
item.dc:creator: @haz_system haz system
item.description:
@haz_system wrote:

search for moo then under the last } paste this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(5) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT" } }

-Where it says NPC ID put the npc number in there.
-Where it says YOUR TEXT add what the npc should say.

Read full topic
